doc.title: Builders of Images
doc.plot: BUILDERS OF IMAGES celebrates the creative energy that enlivens all forms of artistic expression in Latin America and the Caribbean. The complex, distinctive and increasingly influential artistic voice of the Americas is seen in the works of four gifted individuals: Luis Rafael Sánchez, a Puerto Rican writer, the Brazilian popular music star Caetano Veloso, Mexican actress and performance artist Jesusa Rodríguez, and Argentine filmmaker Fernando Solanas.
